title: COVID-19 Home Test Supplemental Information
cleaned_text: COVID-19 Home Test Supplemental Information Thank you for choosing to home test for COVID-19. Need help using your COVID-19 Home Test? For help taking your home test, scan the QR code on the back of the box. If your COVID-19 test is positive This information applies to positive results from home tests and tests performed by a medical provider. What to do if you're exposed Instead of quarantining and regardless of vaccination status, CDC recommends that you wear a high-quality mask for 10 days and get tested on day 5 if you were exposed to COVID-19. [Read the August 11, 2022 press release.](https://www.cdc.gov/media/releases/2022/p0811-covid-guidance.html) Learn where to get a vaccine [Where to get a COVID vaccine](https://www.gnrhealth.com/covid-vaccine-scheduling/) [¿Dónde recibir la vacuna de covid?](https://es.gnrhealth.com/covid-vaccine-scheduling/) Questions If you have additional questions, please call us for more help at 770-339-4260 and ask to speak with an epidemiologist. Page last updated September
